title: Sri Lanka to begin fourth Covid dose for over 60s
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka will begin administering a fourth Coronavirus vaccine dose for over 60s from next week Health Minister Channa Jayasumana said.
For those between the ages of 20 and 60 with complications the fourth vaccine will also be given.
Recipients will be given Pfizer vaccine for which sufficient stocks are available in government stores, Minister Jayasumana said.
Sri Lanka’s daily Coronavirus confirmations are now less than 100 and daily deaths are sometimes zero.
